data.author: Reuters in Sao Paulo
data.description: Flavia Nascimento insists Brazilian footballing great ‘is not saying goodbye right now’The Brazilian footballing great Pele has not been moved to palliative care, one of his daughters has said, downplaying reports that he was in end-of-life care after the 82-year-old was hospitalised last week to re-evaluate his treatment for colon cancer.One of the greatest players of all time, Pele had a tumour removed from his colon in September 2021 and has been receiving hospital care on a regular basis. Continue reading...
data.title: Pele is not under palliative care despite reports, says daughter
